mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_unauthorized_device_log ( pc_uuid, vendor, product, info, pc_hostname, rgstr_date, org_seq ) VALUES
( #{item.pc_uuid}, #{item.vendor}, #{item.product}, #{item.info}, #{item.pc_hostname}, #{item.rgstr_date},
(select org_seq from public.tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{item.pc_uuid} ) )
